subject: Nutrition
title: Apple Cider Vinegar Claims
description: Learn Apple Cider Vinegar Claims in one minute.

hook.text: Social media says apple cider vinegar burns fat, cures diabetes, and clears skin. Most of that is wrong.

buildup.text: Vinegar contains acetic acid, which has shown some ability to slow blood sugar spikes after meals.

discovery.text: One small study found vinegar before meals slightly improved blood sugar in type 2 diabetics.

twist.text: No study supports fat-burning claims. Drinking undiluted vinegar erodes enamel and irritates the throat.

climax.text: Apple cider vinegar may have a tiny blood sugar benefit. Everything else is folklore dressed as science.

punchline.text: A splash of truth in an ocean of exaggeration.

quiz.question: What is the one potential benefit of apple cider vinegar?
